creatorStatement.p1: An experience unlike anything else. From the moment you abstract yourself from who you are, you enter an unknown space, an uncharted territory.
creatorStatement.p2: The world bombards us with stimuli constantly. Real Self brings you closer to the one who perceives those stimuli.

quote.text: "Give him a mask and he will tell you the truth."
quote.author: Oscar Wilde

context.intro: Real Self has captivated over 80,000 participants across Buenos Aires, Barcelona, and Santiago. Now we're seeking partners to bring this transformative experience to China.

hero.subtitle: Immersive Experience
hero.title: Real Self
hero.tagline: A transformative journey where anonymity reveals authenticity

experience.title: The Experience
experience.subtitle: A journey to the unknown within

opening.p1: The world bombards us with stimuli constantly. Every notification, every image, every demand for our attention pulls us further from ourselves.
opening.p2: Real Self is something that brings you closer to connect with the one who perceives those stimuli. Not the roles you play, not the masks you wear in daily life, but the one who watches, who feels, who simply is.
opening.p3: The mind is like water that bubbles, constantly creating and emitting thoughts. This project is like a blank page where you simply pour out the sensations you have and can see them with more clarity.

one.title: The Unknown
one.subtitle: Entering an uncharted territory
one.p1: From the moment you abstract yourself from who you are, you enter an unknown space, an uncharted territory.
one.p2: You don't know what's going to happen. The voice guides you to places you don't usually visit. It feels like a journey to something unknown where you don't know what the voice will tell you next.
one.p3: Everyone wears the same. Everyone is anonymous. In this equality, something extraordinary becomes possible.

two.title: Reconnection with Self
two.subtitle: The questions that reveal
two.p1: We live hiding, in the last attic, the part of us that we consider invalid. And we do not hide it because it is invalid, but it is invalid because we hide it.
two.p2: The experience asks questions. Real questions. Questions that invite you to step forward, to acknowledge truths you've kept private. And in the anonymity of the masks, you find permission.
two.p3: Who wants to free themselves from shame? The weight we carry. The permission to release it, together.

three.title: Reconnection with Others
three.subtitle: The revelation, the celebration
three.p1: A journey that rescues energy, and that energy then explodes in the moment of happiness, in the moment of the party, in the moment of the revelation.
three.p2: A journey that goes from the unknown to a reconnection with oneself and then a reconnection with the other.
three.p3: The masks come off. You see faces for the first time. And you realize you've shared something profound with strangers who are no longer strangers.

experience.centerQuote: "This experience is going to be our secret and magical cave, but this time, we will be able to share it."

unknown.title: You don't know what will happen
unknown.desc: In a world where everything is previewed and spoiled, Real Self offers genuine surprise. Each moment unfolds without expectation.

voice.title: A voice guides you deeper
voice.desc: The narration takes you to points you don't usually visit. Questions that matter. Invitations to be present.

anonymity.title: Freedom in anonymity
anonymity.desc: Behind the mask, social roles dissolve. You're not your job, your status, your appearance. You're simply human among humans.

revelation.title: The moment of revelation
revelation.desc: After the journey inward, the collective celebration. Energy that builds and releases. Connection that surprises.

directors.label: From the Creators
directors.text: "This experience is unlike anything else. Because from the moment you abstract yourself from who you are, you enter an unknown space and an unwalked path. That's where something different can happen."

specifications.title: Specifications
specifications.subtitle: Technical details for the Real Self experience

duration.label: Minutes
duration.desc: Audience standing for the entire experience

capacity.label: Participants
capacity.desc: Per session, up to 6 shows per day

detox.label: No Phones
detox.desc: Private lockers provided for all belongings

climate.title: Climate Control - Critical
climate.desc: Strong air conditioning is essential (21°C target, 4000 m³/min air renewal). Participants wear full overalls, gloves, and masks for 75 minutes. The venue must maintain comfortable temperatures throughout.

space.title: Venue Space
space.desc: Experience: 20-26m x 14-18m (by capacity), Changing: 250-350m², plus lobby, control room (15m²), and storage. Total footprint: ~500-1000m².

ceiling.title: Ceiling Height
ceiling.desc: Optimal 10-12 meters. Dark gray perimeter frame must be at least 5m high. Projectors mounted on trusses for 360° projection mapping.

blackout.title: Full Blackout
blackout.desc: Complete light control required. No external light can enter the experience space during shows. Essential for projection quality.

sound.title: Sound System
sound.desc: 360-degree surround sound system (4.1 or 2.1 minimum). Clear voice narration and immersive audio are central to the experience.

foyer.title: Foyer & Check-in
foyer.desc: Welcome drinks, storing belongings in lockers, playful interactions

changing.title: Transformation
changing.desc: Participants change into identical white overalls, gloves, and masks

experience.title: The Experience
experience.desc: 75-minute immersive journey with 360° projections, voice guidance, and interaction

revelation.title: The Revelation
revelation.desc: Powerful collective moment, masks come off, celebration

return.title: Return & Exit
return.desc: Participants change back, retrieve belongings, optional post-show bar

cta.subtitle: Explore the financial scenarios for your venue

techRider.title: Technical Rider
techRider.subtitle: Complete technical specifications for venue setup
techRider.intro: This rider summarizes Real Self's technical requirements. Our Production Manager will work directly with your local team to review all requirements and adapt to venue conditions. Select your venue size below to see specific requirements.

table.experienceReq: Rectangular, no columns, total blackout, dark gray perimeter frame 5m+ high
table.changingReq: Connected to experience space, individual lockers for participants
table.lobbyReq: Covered area with bathrooms, F&B facilities, merchandise display
table.controlReq: Outside experience space, houses lighting/sound/video operators
table.storageReq: Secure indoor area for flight cases, costumes, masks, racks

key.capacityDesc: People per show, up to 6 shows/day
key.blackoutDesc: Complete darkness required, black velour drapes
key.floorDesc: Dark gray carpet, supports scissor lifts
key.climateDesc: Air renewal varies by venue size

floorPlan.title: Floor Plan Layout
floorPlan.subtitle: Large venue configuration - approximately 1000 m² total

projectors.title: Projectors
projectors.desc: High-lumen projectors (5,000+ ANSI) for floor and wall coverage

ceiling.title: Ceiling Height
ceiling.desc: Minimum 5m, ideal 9m for optimal projection distance

sound.title: Sound System
sound.desc: Surround sound system (4.1 minimum) for immersive audio

servers.title: Media Servers
servers.desc: High-performance media servers for synchronized playback

power.title: Power
power.desc: Dedicated power circuits for AV equipment

climate.title: Climate Control
climate.desc: Participants wear full costumes for 55+ minutes

q1.question: What is the minimum space required?
q1.answer: For a small venue (150 capacity), you need approximately 500m² total with experience space of 20m x 14m and 250m² changing room. For the recommended large venue (350 capacity), approximately 1000m² is required with experience space of 26m x 18m and 350m² changing room. Both include foyer, control room (15m²), and storage.

q2.question: How many projectors are needed?
q2.answer: Small venue (150 capacity) requires 18 projectors, while large venue (350 capacity) needs 36 projectors. These are ceiling-mounted, high-lumen projectors (6,500-12,000 ANSI lumens) that provide full floor and wall coverage for the immersive projections. You'll need a Disguise or Watchout video server system with 18 or 36 outputs respectively.

q3.question: Can I use my existing venue?
q3.answer: Possibly! The key requirements are: sufficient floor area, minimum 5m ceiling height, ability to achieve complete blackout, and strong climate control. Warehouses, event halls, and theater spaces often work well. We evaluate each venue individually.

q4.question: What if my ceiling is less than 5m?
q4.answer: Ceiling height below 5m significantly limits projection coverage and the immersive quality. We may be able to adapt with different projector configurations, but this requires individual assessment. The ideal is 9m for optimal floor projection distance.

q5.question: Who provides the equipment?
q5.answer: The partner provides all AV equipment (projectors, media servers, sound system, lighting). Real Self provides technical supervision, content, projection mapping design, and show control programming. We work with your local AV team during installation.

q6.question: How long does installation take?
q6.answer: Full installation takes approximately 20 days. This includes equipment installation, projection mapping and calibration, sound setup, staff training, and technical rehearsals. Our team of 2-4 people will be on-site throughout.

cta.subtitle: See the detailed technical requirements for installation

audio.title: Audio System
audio.subtitle: Multichannel system with 10 outputs for immersive 360° sound

video.title: Video System
video.subtitle: 360° projection mapping on all 4 walls and floor. Target: 100 ANSI lumens per m² on dark gray surface.
video.note: The choice of projector power and lenses depends on venue conditions. We will work with your team to review your local equipment proposal and ensure the best possible experience.

cctv.title: CCTV & Communications
cctv.subtitle: Essential for security and monitoring. Must see and hear in all areas.

script.title: The Script
script.tagline: A glimpse into the voice that guides the journey

intro.label: Reduced Version
intro.title: Selected excerpts from the experience's voice-over script
intro.desc: Throughout the 75-minute immersive journey, a voice guides participants through questions, reflections, and invitations. The projections on the walls and floor respond to each moment, creating visual cues that participants follow. What follows is a curated selection that captures the tone, emotional arc, and philosophical depth of the Real Self experience.

01.text: "Do you accept to be honest during the entire experience?"
01.context: The first question. A contract with oneself. The journey begins with a choice.

02.text: "Give him a mask and he will tell you the truth."
02.context: The philosophical foundation. Anonymity as liberation, not concealment.

03.text: "We live hiding, in the last attic, the part of us that we consider invalid. And we do not hide it because it is invalid, but it is invalid because we hide it."
03.context: The core insight. What we suppress doesn't disappear - it waits.

04.text: "If you have ever felt a fear of dying, cross the white line."
04.context: The projection creates a boundary on the floor. Those who resonate step forward. A visible act of shared truth.

05.text: "Are you truly willing to fall in love today?"
05.context: Not romantic love only - but the vulnerability of opening to another.

06.text: "Who wants to free themselves from shame?"
06.context: The weight we carry. The permission to release it, together.

07.text: "This experience is going to be our secret and magical cave, but this time, we will be able to share it."
07.context: From isolation to communion. The safe space we create together.

08.context: The physical invitation. Movement as truth.

09.context: The question that follows you home. The real journey begins.

script.closing: "What would it be like to live like this?"

revenue.merchandiseNote: Mini masks, art prints, apparel, accessories

costs.title: Weekly Costs
costs.marketingNote: Note: Marketing costs not included. Partner handles all promotion and ticket sales.

references.title: Revenue Assumptions Based on Comparable Experiences
references.meowwolf: Meow Wolf: 1M+ visitors/year per location, $40-50 tickets
references.vangogh: Van Gogh Immersive: 5M+ total visitors, $30-45 tickets
references.note: Revenue assumptions are based on comparable immersive experiences in major cities. Actual results may vary based on local market conditions, marketing effectiveness, and operational efficiency.

scenarios.subtitle: Projected revenue and costs by venue size
scenarios.intro: Each scenario represents a different venue capacity with projected revenue and operating costs. All figures are estimates based on standard operating assumptions.
scenarios.projectedNote: All figures are estimates based on standard operating assumptions

setup.title: Installation Costs
setup.subtitle: Expert supervision to ensure a perfect launch
setup.intro: Our Franchise Director travels to your location to provide comprehensive training, materials, manuals, and brand guidelines. Through expert supervision and quality audits, we ensure your team can deliver the Real Self experience to perfection.

model.title: The Franchise Model
model.text: One expert Franchise Director travels to your venue with all materials, instructions, and guidelines needed to train your team. They supervise setup, audit quality, and ensure the experience meets our brand standards.

investment.title: Investment
investment.feeNote: Includes all materials, manuals, guides, and training

travel.title: Travel Requirements
travel.text: Travel expenses include round-trip flights, hotel accommodation for the on-site period, local transportation, and meals. For flights exceeding 6 hours, business class is required to ensure the director arrives ready to work.

timeline.title: Support Timeline
timeline.subtitle: 6 weeks of dedicated support throughout your launch

before.label: Pre-Setup
before.desc: Remote coordination, vendor selection guidance, and preparation of materials

during.label: On-Site
during.desc: Director present at venue for training, supervision, and quality audits

after.label: Post-Launch
after.desc: Remote support for adjustments, troubleshooting, and final refinements

included.title: What's Included
included.manuals: Complete franchise manuals and brand guidelines
included.vendors: Guidance on costume and lighting vendor selection
included.audit: Quality audit and brand compliance review

excluded.title: Not Included
excluded.note: Custom modifications to the experience are quoted separately.

addon.title: Assistant Director
addon.desc: For complex venues or larger teams, an assistant can be added to support the Franchise Director. Travel expenses apply based on location.

partner.title: Provided by Partner
partner.desc: All equipment and infrastructure is sourced locally by the partner. The Franchise Director provides guidance and specifications only.

partnership.title: Partnership Model
partnership.subtitle: A proven structure for mutual success

tickets.label: Ticket Sales
tickets.desc2: Partner receives 70% of gross profit after operating costs

food.label: Food & Drinks
food.desc2: Partner keeps all F&B revenue - welcome drinks, snacks, post-show bar

merch.label: Merchandise
merch.desc2: Partner keeps 100% if self-managed, or 70/30 if Real Self designs & produces

technical.title: Technical Supervision
technical.desc: On-site guidance and supervision for your AV team during installation, projector mapping, audio calibration, and system integration.

training.title: Staff Training
training.desc: Comprehensive training program for guides, technicians, and management to ensure authentic experience delivery.

creative.title: Creative Content
creative.desc: Full projection content, audio design, and narrative adapted for Chinese audience with cultural consultation.

qa.title: Quality Assurance
qa.desc: Regular visits by our creative team to ensure experience quality and provide ongoing refinements.

brand.title: Brand Assets
brand.desc: Full marketing toolkit including logos, photography, video assets, and brand guidelines for local campaigns.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.desc: Direct communication channel for troubleshooting, updates, and expansion planning support.

relocation.title: Location Flexibility
relocation.desc1: The entire experience can be relocated to a new venue in just two weeks, including full teardown and reinstallation.
relocation.desc2: Partners handle the migration process with our guidance and support, allowing them to move between venues, test new markets, or expand to additional locations with minimal downtime.

thankyou.title: Thank You for Your Interest
thankyou.message: We're excited about the possibility of bringing Real Self to China. Our team is ready to discuss how we can create an unforgettable experience together.
thankyou.contact: For inquiries, please reach out to discuss partnership opportunities.

hero.subtitle: There are no actors. No passive spectators. Every ticket holder becomes the protagonist. This is not immersive wall art. This is immersive engagement and transformation.

manifesto.label: The Premise
manifesto.heading: The Outside Awakens What's Inside
manifesto.p1: Participants enter, suit up, and wear a full anonymity mask and coveralls. Identity drops. Status drops. Roles drop. What remains is pure experience.
manifesto.p2: Through a precisely designed environment of light, sound, 360-degree projection, music, and guided voice narrative, participants move through a structured emotional and sensory journey designed to reconnect them with their authentic self.

video.title: A Glimpse Inside
video.caption: Watch how participants transform from strangers to connected souls

benefits.title: What People Get From Real Self

anonymity.title: Total Anonymity & Freedom
anonymity.text: A rare chance to be no one. No labels, no roles, no social identity. Fully covered face and body. This creates psychological permission to open, move, and feel without self-consciousness.

connection.title: Deep Human Connection
connection.text: Not digital. Not remote. Not passive. A fully engaged, collective human experience shared in real space. No cell phones. You cannot replicate this on a screen or at home.

lasting.title: Emotional Impact That Lasts
lasting.text: People forget movies. Concert buzz fades. Real Self becomes a long-term memory. Participants describe it as something they carry with them for years and want to revisit.

discovery.title: Self-Discovery Journey
discovery.text: Moments of insight people didn't expect. Truths they hadn't admitted. Inner realizations delivered through experience, not instruction.

euphoria.title: Collective Euphoria & Release
euphoria.text: It is not only reflective and deep. It is also joyful, physical, and celebratory. Movement. Dance. Music. Shared emotional release. A rare combination of introspection and exhilaration.

about.quote: "People are tired of pretty paintings on a wall. They want action. They want to feel something real."

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Venue?
cta.subtitle: There is nothing else like this. Real Self is not an evolution of something that exists. It is its own category, created from scratch, unlike anything audiences have ever experienced.
